title: Sun Day Burgers - Markthalle Neun
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Western, Fast food, Take-out
description: Booth located in an old food market hall (markthall9) offering an organic burger which consists of whole wheat bun, grilled tofu steak, lots of fresh veggies and three different sauces your choice. Also sells raw cakes, fermented rawghurt, brownies, smoothies and seasonal juices. Everything is gluten free.
